cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to an out-of-range value 999 will cause SCTP stream negotiation failures, leading to connection establishment errors and unreachable routing to DU or AMF.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_frequencyBand to an invalid out-of-range value 999 will cause frequency band misalignment, resulting in invalid downlink carrier configurations and cell initialization failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_frequencyBand 設定為無效的超出範圍值 999 會導致頻率帶錯位，造成無效的下行載波配置和細胞初始化失敗。
